wikipedia_page.main: Peggy Clarke (née Wood) (29 October 1937 – 15 September 2018) was joint British ladies' chess champion in 1966. She was the daughter of Baruch Harold Wood and married Peter Hugh Clarke in 1962. They had three daughters.

response: Peggy Clarke or Peggy Clark may refer to:
*Peggy Clarke (chess player) (1926–2018), joint British ladies' chess champion
*Peggy Clarke, an actress in No Way Back
* Peggy Clarke (29 October 1937 – 15 September 2018), British Women's Champion in 1966.
*Peggy Clarke, 80, British chess player.RIP Peggy Clarke
